name: 6K Feet Under
description:
Project developed for the subject of “Completion Work of Period 2 – 3D Game”, where the goal is to develop a prototype of a game, document what was planned and the processes used during the development and make a final presentation for the professors from the IFRJ Campus Eng. Paulo de Frontin.

In 6K Under Feet, the player incarnates Monika Stenium Rogers whose mission is to steal a powerful artifact from the core of C-137, the thirteenth planet of her planetary system.

As an intruder on this distant planet she encounters several enemies, inhabitants who see her as a threat and to reach the bottom of the planet she must fight them. As it is an unexplored planet Monika must tread her way until hers final objective, exploring and knowing more of that world.

The game is separated into 6 phases that form a cycle of challenges. The player must explore the level, as each scenario challenge will be presented.

After that she must return to the ship and defend her ship from waves of enemies while upgrades for excavations are made. The player will enter the ship to perform upgrades and complete a cycle.

THE GAME IS PORTUGUESE.
